identity.name: Magnova-Nova ERP Design System
identity.philosophy: Swiss Utility & High-Density Precision. No fluff, just data.
identity.archetype: The Performance Pro (Archetype 2) mixed with Swiss High-Contrast (Archetype 4)

usage_rules.headings: Use Chivo Black for page titles (text-3xl+). Use Chivo Bold for section headers.
usage_rules.body: Use Public Sans for all UI text. High legibility at small sizes (13px/14px).
usage_rules.data: Use JetBrains Mono for ALL IDs (PO Numbers, IMEIs, SKUs, Transaction IDs). This is non-negotiable for readability.
usage_rules.tracking: Tighten headings (tracking-tight). Loosen tiny caps labels (tracking-widest).

rules.shadows: Use 'tactical' shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for dropdowns. No massive soft diffusions.
rules.contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Text on colored badges must be white or very dark, never grey.

grid_strategy.dashboard: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density). grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4.
grid_strategy.forms: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6. Align inputs to grid lines.

structure.sidebar: Fixed width (240px), collapsible. Dark theme for contrast against light content area.
structure.header: Sticky top, white background, 1px bottom border. Contains Global Search and User Profile.
structure.main: bg-slate-50 min-h-screen. Max-width container centered for ultra-wide screens.

buttons.style: Sharp corners (rounded-sm) or slightly rounded (rounded-md). No pill shapes for ERP.

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm rounded-lg. Header separated by border-b.

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20 focus:border-blue-500 rounded-md h-10.

tables.style: Density: Compact. Text: text-sm. Header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 font-medium uppercase tracking-wider text-xs.
tables.actions: Right-aligned, visible on hover or always visible via '...' menu.

badges.style: rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium border

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the Sidebar to give it a 'physical' feel.

login_background.treatment: Overlay with bg-slate-900/80 to ensure text readability.

accessibility.contrast: Strict adherence to APCA. No light grey text on white.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-offset-2) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: All icon-only buttons must have aria-label.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors.
Do not center text in tables. Align Left for text, Right for numbers.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Use Shadcn UI components as the base, but override styles to match this system.
For date pickers, use the Shadcn Calendar component.
For select inputs, use the Shadcn Select component.
